# Data process



## Finland

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

The study-specific variables elected to be harmonised is:


* Name: `q3023_days`
* Label: `In a typical week, on how many days do you walk or bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?`
* Categories:
   + `Continuous variable`
* Missings
   + `NA`


```{r assign finland w1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks','Courage.Courage_Finland_w1', variables=list('q3023_days'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local finland w1, echo=F}
COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks <- opal.execute(o,'COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks')
Continuous_summary(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$q3023_days)
ggplot(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks, aes(x=factor(q3023_days))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of walks") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `q3023*4`
* `NA into 999`

```{r harmo finland w1}
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$id)
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks <- Recode(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$q3023_days*4, "NA = '999' ")
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks, labels = c(Missing=999, Do_not_know=998, Refuse=997, Not_applicable=996, Does_not_answer=995,  Not_attempt_not_done=994, Disable_to_measure=993, Impute=992, CAPI_interviewer_error=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript finland w1, echo=F}
Continuous_summary(var = COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, aes(x=factor(n_walks))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of walks in a month") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation finland w1, echo=F}
AfterH <- table(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks)
X<-table(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$q3023_days)
BeforeH <- c(X,sum(is.na(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$q3023_days)))
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c(paste(sort(unique(na.omit(COURAGE_finland_w1_n_walks$q3023_days))),"->",sort(unique(na.omit(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$n_walks)))[-9],sep=""),"NA->999")  
kable(C)
```
